justhealth.jhapp

Class LoadImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • justhealth.jhapp.LoadImage

  • public class LoadImage
extends <any>
    Loads An Image from a specified URL into a given ImageView Inspired by and uses code from: http://web.archive.org/web/20120802025411/http://developer.aiwgame.com/imageview-show-image-from-url-on-android-4-0.html

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadImage(ImageView iv, boolean blur, Context context)
      LoadImage Constructor specifying a target TextView and Context

      Run through new LoadImage().execute(urls)
      static Bitmap fastblur(Bitmap sentBitmap, int radius)
      Mario Klingemann's function to efficiently provide a blur to a Bitmap
      static java.lang.String getProfilePictureURL(java.lang.String filename)
      Build the correct URL of a profilepicture image that is stored on the server

      Built in method that runs on completion of doInBackground().

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadImage

        public LoadImage(ImageView iv,
                 boolean blur,
                 Context context)
        LoadImage Constructor specifying a target TextView and Context
        Parameters:
        iv - The target ImageView to load the image into
        blur - Whether to apply a blur to the image
        context - getApplicationContext()

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected Bitmap doInBackground(java.lang.String... url)
        Run through new LoadImage().execute(urls)
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the requested image
        Returns:
        A BitMap object of the image

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(Bitmap image)
        Built in method that runs on completion of doInBackground(). Displays the loaded image into the target TextView iv
        Parameters:
        image - The image to display

      • getProfilePictureURL

        public static java.lang.String getProfilePictureURL(java.lang.String filename)
        Build the correct URL of a profilepicture image that is stored on the server
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the image. Can be found via /api/getAccountInfo
        Returns:
        The full URL of the resource

      • fastblur

        public static Bitmap fastblur(Bitmap sentBitmap,
                              int radius)
        Mario Klingemann's function to efficiently provide a blur to a Bitmap
        Parameters:
        sentBitmap - The bitmap image to blur
        radius - The level of blur to be applied
        Returns:
        The blurred Bitmap
